message-unknown_alert.message: Could not parse code. Please make sure this is a valid AirGap code. You can try to handle this code in {{otherApp.name}} by using the "Relay" button below.

message-not-supported_alert.message: Please use {{otherApp.name}} to handle this code. You can click the "Relay" button below to do that.

not-supported-alert.title: Oops
not-supported-alert.message: Deeplinking is only supported on mobile devices.

app-not-found.title: Oops
app-not-found.message: It looks like you don't have {{otherApp.name}} installed on this device.

invalid.title: Oops
invalid.message: It looks like the deeplink could not be generated

empty.description: Tap the "+" icon to load a new module from your phone storage

content.description: Load 3rd party modules into your vault to add additional features.
content.note: Please note: Installing modules is done at your own risk. The functionality and maintenance of these modules is handled by thirt parties and are not affiliated with AirGap.

public-key.label: Public Key
public-key.not-verified_warning: It looks like this module wasn't signed by this public key.
